title: Political Favor
description: Trade 10% People to gain 15% Influence.

title: Fund the Movement
description: Lose 12% Money, gain 20% People.

title: Resource Swap
description: Offer to trade 8% Influence for 10% Money from any player who accepts.

title: Shared Agenda
description: Give 5% Money to all other players and receive 8% People from each.

title: The Public Deal
description: Visible: Trade 10% Money to gain 15% People. Hidden: If 2 or more players vote Yes, they each lose 5% Money.

title: The Peace Pact
description: Visible: Trade 5% People for 10% Influence. Hidden: If everyone votes No, gain 15% Money.

title: Temporary Alliance
description: Visible: Swap 10% Influence with one player. Hidden: If only 1 player votes Yes, they lose 10% People.

title: The Great Betrayal
description: If all players vote No, they each lose 10% Money, and you receive all their lost funds.

title: The Bribe
description: If exactly 1 player votes Yes, you gain 20% Influence. They lose 20% Money.

title: Red Button
description: Everyone who votes Yes gains 10% People, but the player who drew the card gains 30% Money if even one person says Yes.

title: Charity Campaign
description: Lose 8% Money to gain 14% People.

title: Influencer Partnership
description: Trade 12% People to gain 18% Influence.

title: Silent Donation
description: Give 10% Money to another player, receive 15% People from them.

title: Covert Influence
description: Lose 6% People, gain 11% Influence.

title: Shady Deal
description: Visible: Trade 5% Money to gain 10% Influence. Hidden: If 3 players vote Yes, they each lose 4% People.

title: Media Spin
description: Visible: Swap 6% People for 12% Influence. Hidden: If everyone votes No, gain 18% Money.

title: Mutual Aid
description: Visible: Give 5% Money to one player. Hidden: If they vote Yes, you also gain 10% Influence.

title: Power Surge
description: If even one player votes Yes, gain 25% Influence. All Yes voters lose 12% People.

title: Collapse and Conquer
description: If everyone votes No, each loses 15% Money. You gain 35% Influence.

title: Blood Pact
description: If 2 players vote Yes, they each gain 10% People. You gain 20% Money and 10% Influence.
